attributes.action: All key workers tax free on their wages for helping keeping the country running
attributes.additional_details: All the key workers have helped in their own way to keep the country running to keep people alive and to ensure the whole country doesn't come to a standstill and they should be appreciated and shown our gratitude by giving tax free months like you have done with businesses for at least the period of the lockdown.
attributes.background: All key workers (including NHS, transport, teachers shop workers and police) throughout the coronavirus lockdown should be given tax free months for putting themselves at risk as well as their households and for also working so many hours and as an incentive to say thank you.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
